contents.item: There is no such thing as isolated stress. Stress is always system wide.
contents.owner: Janet Gallagher Nestor, Nurturing Wellness Through Radical Self-Care: A Living in Balance Guide and Workbook

contents.item: When we rest, our energy is restored.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Take time to relax, renew and be revived.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita

contents.item: Sometimes the walk to the doctors is a better cure than the medicine you receive
contents.owner: Benny Bellamacina, Philosophical Uplifting Quotes and Poems

contents.item: Beautiful food and health are priceless.
contents.owner: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

contents.item: The only way to spread peace is to have peace inside you  Yogi vini
contents.owner: Yogi Vini

contents.item: Life is eternal game, there are no rules. Indulge yourself.
contents.owner: Osh Marty

contents.item: Relax and be Revitalize!
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Your soul is a precious gift from an imaginative loving Source that endlessly breathes life.
contents.owner: Dashama Konah Gordon, Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

contents.item: Jesus was a hiker. The wilderness was His retreat.
contents.owner: Toni Sorenson

contents.item: Health is a priceless wealth. Invest while you can.
contents.owner: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

contents.item: There is no virtue in poverty and illness. we all have been created to be healthy and wealthy with more than enough for everyone.
contents.owner: Raphael Zernoff, All That Is

contents.item: Your composite health is directly proportional to your composite wealth.
contents.owner: Anthony   Pan

contents.item: It is not much different from a person who goes to the gym to exercise on a regular basis versus someone who sits on the couch watching television. Proper physical exercise increases your chances of health, and proper mental exercise increases your chances for wealth. Laziness decreases both health and wealth.
contents.owner: Robert T. Kiyosaki, Rich Dad, Poor Dad

contents.item: The spirit of a man can survive a sick body.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita

contents.item: Our true spirit can never become diseased or distressed.
contents.owner: Marcey Shapiro, Freedom From Anxiety: A Holistic Approach to Emotional Well-Being

contents.item: And I read hundreds and thousands of books, day and night, always awake and always eager to seek health. But in no book I found what I was looking for. Then, shut up in my parents' house, I thought and suffered for hundreds and thousands of hours, always awake and always mindful of the tremendous anxiety of health. But I still have not found what I was looking for.
contents.owner: Giovanni Papini, Il Tragico Quotidiano

contents.item: I could never kill myself. I approve of suicide if you have horrible health. Otherwise it's the ultimate hissy fit.
contents.owner: John Waters

contents.item: The shortest and the hardest journey to make is the inner one.
contents.owner: Omisona Fasina, Inner View - Choosing Authenticity

contents.item: Relax, Recreate and Refresh!
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
